title: Should Christians Regard Jordan Peterson as a Christian?
description:
The "Christian Edition" of the Jordan Peterson "Is he or isn't he" game is one talked about in many online discussions. What does Peterson say he is? Why all the confusion? 

Christie Blatchford Interview http://nationalpost.com/feature/christie-blatchford-sits-down-with-warrior-for-common-sense-jordan-peterson 

Tim Lott's pieces https://life.spectator.co.uk/2017/09/jordan-peterson-and-the-transgender-wars/ 

https://www.theguardian.com/global/2018/jan/21/jordan-peterson-self-help-author-12-steps-interview 

https://youtu.be/RIB05YeMiW8 

Jordan Levine's Transliminal 2015 https://youtu.be/07Ys4tQPRis (Levine's Patreon page https://www.patreon.com/transliminal) 

My sermon on Grace and "Saved" https://youtu.be/nSVq1dcrYrI
